We would love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or are interested in joining or partnering with the Kenyan Community in Scotland, feel free to reach out.

## Connect with Us

Stay updated with our latest news, events, and community activities by connecting with us on social media. Follow our official accounts to learn about upcoming cultural festivals, community gatherings, professional networking opportunities, and important updates that matter to the Kenyan community living in Scotland. Our platforms also provide a space to celebrate our achievements, share our stories, and support one another.

## Visit Us

We occasionally host community events, meetups, and cultural festivals across Scotland. Keep an eye on our [Events page](events/index.qmd) for upcoming gatherings!
